This is Ken's self-introduction/h2>

Hello, my name is Ken. I come from Anji County, Huzhou City, Zhejiang Province. My hobbies are traveling and playing games. At present, I am majoring in applied computer technology in Ningbo City Vocational and technical college. I love this major very much, so I hope to work in computer related industries in the future.
